page.title: 12Youth Groups in Stamford Br.
page.content: The boys and girls from our village, and children from High and Low Catton join the clubs in Stamford Bridge.We have Brownies,Guides,Cubs,Scouts,a Youth Club and a Drama club and a Venture Scout club.Guy Oldfield belongs to the Stamford Bridge Cubs: We are called the Vikings,after the battle.We go from 6.30pm until 8.00pm.In that time we work for badges.I went for my First Aid badge.But I failed.The leader is called Akela: means the wise wolf.On the 22nd of June 1985 our cubs went to Pocklington where we worked for badges.I passed my Athlete Badge.I had to do a 20m sprint,a long jump,a high jump and throw the cricket ball.When we went to Givendale Camp I fell in the stream.It was not deep but I got stuck because it was very boggy.
